Sentence 2: An email log.

Determine whether the word "log" is used in the same sense in both sentences. Yes or no?

Sentence 2: Instructional designers are trained in something that might be called tradecraft.

Determine whether the word "bridge" is used in the same sense in both sentences. Yes or no?

Determine whether the word "wish" is used in the same sense in both sentences. Yes or no?
